quotes.quote: It is important to have people believe in you. With this support, what you can achieve is limitless.
Service is a limitless opportunity, it is the reason why we breathe.
Breathe in the sweet air of limitless possibility, and make life as rich as you know it can be.
Your ability to love, to reach out, and to experience life is limitless. The limitation is only of the body and mind.
The universe is limitless and so are you. There is a limitless supply of good that the universe wants to show you. Step out of the way and let it be!
Your brain has a capacity for learning that is virtually limitless, which makes every human a potential genius.
If you are aware of your weaknesses and are constantly learning, your potential is virtually limitless.
The great gift of the human imagination is that it has no limits or ending.
Limitless is your potential. Magnificent is your future.
Civilization is a limitless multiplication of unnecessary necessities.
Our opportunities to give of ourselves are indeed limitless, but they are also perishable.
Life is wide, limitless. There is no border, no frontier.
The artist's world is limitless. It can be found anywhere, far from where he lives or a few feet away. It is always on his doorstep.
Human minds are limitless, like space. It may be foolish for a person to even try to deliberately affect another person's mind.
Do not limit the limitless God! With Him, face the future unafraid because you are never alone.
If you embrace that the things that you can do are limitless, you can put your ding in the universe. You can change the world.
The number of ways you can live in one lifetime is limitless. So why limit yourself? The sky is NOT the limit. Beyond the universe is.
God is limitless in His love, and asks that we at least make the effort to be limitless in ours.
When we turn our attention away from ourselves, our potential is limitless.
Human life is limited, but knowledge is limitless. To drive the limited in pursuit of the limitless is fatal; and to presume that one really knows is fatal indeed!
Within us is the unborn possibility of limitless experience. Ours is the privilege of giving birth to it!
The universe is but a partial manifestation of your limitless capacity to become.
A certain type of perfection can only be realized through a limitless accumulation of the imperfect.
Your range of available choices - right now - is limitless.
Human potential is the only limitless resource we have in this world.
The possibilities of success are limitless, as long as you're willing to put the work in.
There exist limitless opportunities in every industry. Where there is an open mind, there will always be a frontier.
God's children have a limitless supply of the fruit of the Spirit.
Imagination might not be limitless. It's still tethered to the universe of what we know.
The truth is limitless in its range, if you drop the T and look at it in reverse it could hurt.
